constituent: permanence, remote, person, stick, fred astaire, taskmaster, heart
koohiiStory1: Mr. T ventured out into a remote area to visit with his wise, old taskmaster who must use a walking stick to get around and originally gave Mr. T the heart to fight crime for the good of the community.
koohiiStory2: Yoda, the Jedi with the walking stick who was a hard taskmaster for Luke but who had a big heart, was permanently exiled on the remote planet Dagobah.
myStory: chữ du. du dương, xa, vĩnh cửu. chữ du và chữ tâm. người cầm thương đi vào tim là du
words: 悠々(ゆうゆう): quiet, calm, leisurely
